    public abstract class ISyncMethod
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that provides a pattern for all server queries. This provides the framework for doing asynchronous queries as well as synchronous queries
    Author:
    Nicolas Lagier

    • Method Detail

      • getMethod

        @Nullable
public static ISyncMethod getMethod(java.lang.String name)
        Access to a method instance from its name. This only works if the method was previously registered through the registerMethod(Class) function.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the method to fetch
        Returns:
        instance of the method if it was registered before, null otherwise

public abstract android.os.Bundle Perform(@NonNull

        Parameters:
        context - used to access the ContentProvider
        args - arguments of the method
        Returns:
        result of the method
